title: Build Notes
content:
Build Notes - ppPage Development

Latest Updates (Build 9390f0d - Jan 31, 2025)

  • Fixed cursor positioning - Flashing cursor now appears inline after text content, never on a new line by itself
  • Enhanced theme background coverage - Fixed white background showing when scrolling by ensuring all containers have theme colors
  • Improved hover note behavior - Hover notes now follow cursor movement and use smart boundary detection to prevent clipping
  • Smart cursor placement - Cursor finds last text element and appends inside it for proper typewriter effect

Previous Updates (Build b00c67f - Jan 30, 2025)

  • Enhanced hover note system - Added cursor following and boundary detection to prevent viewport clipping
  • Fixed background scrolling - Theme colors now persist across all scroll positions
  • Improved positioning logic - Hover notes reposition dynamically based on available screen space

Earlier Updates (Build 0cac4bb - Jan 30, 2025)

  • Added PiousPigeon label - Personal branding label on right side of taskbar with hover note "Welcome to my Blog!"
  • Added flashing cursor effect - Aesthetic blinking underscore at the end of all displayed posts for typewriter feel
  • Fixed theme switching issues - Light theme and custom themes now properly update menu and text backgrounds
  • Fixed menu spam issue - Projects submenu no longer recreates on every hover event
  • Improved Level 3 menu stability - Sub-submenus now only close when explicitly intended

Core Features

  • Navigation Menu System - Projects menu with stable 3-level hierarchy (Level 1: Main, Level 2: Categories, Level 3: Posts)
  • Theme System - Light, dark, and custom HSL themes with proper CSS variable propagation
  • Interactive Hover Notes - Cursor-following tooltips with smart boundary detection for enhanced UX
  • Post Management - GitHub integration for publishing, editing, and managing blog posts
  • Cache Management - Automatic cache clearing on new builds for fresh content delivery
  • Typewriter Effect - Flashing cursor that appears inline after post content for aesthetic appeal

This post tracks all development progress and is updated with each new build to maintain the most recent date.
